snippet.title: Valkyria Chronicles 3 - A Clash Battle! Welkin vs. Dahau [Extra Episode] [DLC]
snippet.description:
Valkyria Chronicles 3
Squad 7's Story:
A Clash Battle! Welkin VS. Dahau
July 1935
Mission: "Squad 7's Pursuit Battle"
Objective: Occupy enemy camps
Difficulty: ---
Weapon received: ヴァルホル SpB (Valhor SpB?) (mauler)

Well, if you were wondering where The Calamity Raven was during the invasion of Ghirlandaio, here's the answer.
In this mission we see Squad 7 (or part of it) combating Dahau's platoon without the help of the Edelweiss.

Man, am I getting tired of seeing Dahau's nape.
